knimeNode.name: Fingerprint Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to write fingerprints from an input table to a FPS file.

fullDescription.intro: This node can be used to write a FPS file using knime fingerprints from an input table. The format of the FPS file is mentioned here: http://code.google.com/p/chem-fingerprints/wiki/FPS
fullDescription.option: The location of the output file where the FPS file will be created.
Whether or not the row ids will be written to the FPS file
The input column containing the fingerprint Ids in case the user wants to read it from an input column to be written to the .fps file.
Whether or not the existing FPS file should be overwritten.
The input column containing knime fingerprints.
